goals__remit: SAMOK is the national advocacy and service organisation for University of Applied Sciences Students (UAS) in Finland. SAMOK’s members are the 25 student unions at the universities of applied sciences. We work for the benefit of UAS students and provide support and services to UAS students unions in order for them to be as successful as possible in advocating for UAS students at their higher education institution. SAMOK’s member unions carry a membership of 68 000 students and overall we represent over 140 000 UAS students. Together with the student unions, SAMOK works for the benefit of students both locally, nationally and internationally.
